courseSectionInformation: Approved for both letter and S/U grading. May be repeated by Ph.D. candidates as topics vary, but without credit, after 8 hours have been earned in this course. Students needing the proseminar for their programs will be given priority enrollment. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in the Department of English or consent of instructor.
